Copyright Claims

If you believe any content infringes on your copyright, please contact us at:

zeelessgames@gmail.com

Please include sufficient information to identify the copyrighted work and alleged infringement. We will review your claim and take appropriate action to remove infringing content promptly.

We typically respond within 12-48 hours.
